## AutoheightParams.width property

By default, the width of `Webshell` will grow to the horizontal space available. This is realized with `width: '100%'` and `alignSelf: 'stretch'`<!-- -->. If you need to set explicit width, do it here.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
width?: number;
```
